## FillTechniqueParams interface

Technique used to draw filled polygons.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FillTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams, PolygonalTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.filltechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Fill color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.filltechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Width of the lines. Currently limited to the \[0, 1\] range. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.filltechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent lines, set a value between <code>0.0</code> for fully transparent, to <code>1.0</code> for fully opaque. |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.filltechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to <code>true</code> if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. |
|  [wireframe](./harp-datasource-protocol.filltechniqueparams.wireframe.md) | boolean | A value of <code>true</code> creates a wireframe geometry. (May not be supported with all techniques). |
